detail_desc: Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short jersey dress with a V-neck that has decorative ties at the front. Short sleeves and a flounced seam at the shoulders and waist. Unlined.
Sleeveless blouse in a soft viscose weave with a narrow collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with woven details, a collar with a sewn-on bow tie, and button placket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and press-studs at the crotch.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy, printed cotton jersey with a round neckline, ribbing at the cuffs and short slits in the sides.
Short dress with cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt.
Wide blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar and V-neck with ties at the front. Wide, 3/4-length balloon sleeves, a gathered seam under the bust and a flared lower section.
5-pocket jeans in soft stretch denim with worn details with patches on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud. Relaxed fit with tapered legs.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, front pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a collar and drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs and reflective details.
Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, details on the shoulders and short cap sleeves. Buttons down the front, elastication at the back of the waist, and a sewn-on tie belt. Satin lining.
Short dress in sturdy cotton jersey with lacing at the waist. Unlined.
Glittery Alice band with a bow on top.

Short, A-line dress in a cotton weave with embroidery. Small frilled collar with an opening and button at the back of the neck, a frill-trimmed yoke at the front with frills going over the shoulders, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Unlined.
Gilet in faux fur with a concealed fastening and decorative bow at the front. Satin lining.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Smocked seam and a frill at the cuffs and hem.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Joggers in lightweight, washed cotton twill with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.

Blouse in an airy weave with a deep V-neck, decorative buttons down the front, long puff sleeves and cuffs with a covered button. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and a gently flared peplum.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Make-up bag in transparent plastic with a zip at the top. Size 11x16x28.5 cm.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.

Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Moisturising lip balm in a plastic pot with a lid. 3.7 g.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Calf-length imitation leather skirt with a sewn-in wrapover, side pockets, zip at the back and asymmetric hem with an opening at the front. Unlined.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Casual style in a relaxed fit with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal welt pockets at the sides and elasticated hems. The cotton content of the joggers is partly organic.

Set with a top and trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey, one patterned.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tunic in jersey crêpe with a rounded hem.
Wide shirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of trousers in organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a sewn-on bow tie at the top, sewn-on waistcoat with decorative buttons down the front, and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Top in textured jersey made from a cotton blend with a boat neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with a narrow opening and concealed button at the top, wide, pleated 3/4-length sleeves, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, pleated skirt. Lined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and a detachable, lined hood with a fastening at the front. Discreet, zipped handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining in recycled polyester.
Fitted, knee-length lace skirt with concealed elastication at the waist. Lined.
Thin metal rings in various designs.

Padded parka with a pile-lined, drawstring hood with a faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with buttons down the front and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets with press-studs, flap front pockets with a press-stud and a small zipped pocket on one sleeve. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Sandals with crossover foot straps, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Platform front 4 cm. Heel 7.5 cm.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and lacing at the front. Smocked seam at the waist with a gently flared peplum, and smocking and a flounce at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a small frilled collar with ties and a V-neck. Raglan sleeves with smocking and a frill at the cuffs.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and zip down the front. Welt side pockets, stretch ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slim fit.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Jacket in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Long dress in an airy, patterned weave made from recycled polyester with a sturdy turtle neck with gathers and a draped front. Opening at the back with concealed press-studs at the back of the neck and a gathered seam at the waist with a drawstring that ties at the sides. Heavily draping skirt with an inset panel in a contrasting colour at the back. Lined skirt.

Jackets in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Unlined. The jackets are made partly from recycled polyester.
Soft bootees in velour with embroidery and appliqués. Ribbed shaft and soft soles with anti-slip protectors. Jersey lining.
Wide trousers in airy chiffon with elastication at the back of the waist, a tie belt at the front and wrapover legs with high slits at the front.

Cold shoulder blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs. Flounces at the front that continue around the shoulders to the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, and a flounce at the hem.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted polo-neck top in ribbed jersey with long sleeves.

Set with a long-sleeved jumper and pair of trousers in a soft jacquard knit. Jumper with a roll edge neckline, decorative bow at the top, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist.
Set of moisturising lip balms in various flavours. 5x4 g. Not for children under 3 years old as the packaging contains small parts.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Key pocket in the waistband.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.

Cargo joggers in washed cotton canvas. Casual style in a relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets with a flap, and bellows pockets with a flap on the legs. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees.

Waterproof hi-top trainers in imitation leather and mesh with a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles. The trainers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sandals in imitation suede with an adjustable hook and loop fastener on one side. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Blouse in a cotton weave with pleats at the top and down the sleeves and a visible zip at the back. Short raglan sleeves with wide elastication and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Super push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back and elasticated ribbing at the hem. Designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Long-sleeved turtleneck top with a concealed zip at the back of the neck.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a linen feel. V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and a fitted bodice with a concealed zip at the back and hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Gathered seam at the waist with an inset, hole-embroidered trim and a flared skirt with pin-tucks and inset, hole-embroidered trims. Lined in a soft cotton weave.
Treggings in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Washed cotton twill trousers in a regular fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood and zip down the front. Side pockets, an inner pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy crinkled weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, buttons down the front and rounded hem. Unlined.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Wide trousers in twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell and linen blend with a high waist and pleats at the top. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.
